title: SCP-6427
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt darkmode=a]]

[[module CSS]]
#u-blink-bar p:last-child::after {
    content: "";
    border-right: 1px solid #e4e4e4;
    animation: blink 1.0s infinite;
    position: relative;
    left: 1px;
}
 
@keyframes blink{
    to {
        opacity: .0;
    }
[[/module]]

[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@


**Item #:** SCP-6427[[footnote]] pending approval. [[/footnote]]

**Object Class:** Keter[[footnote]] pending approval. [[/footnote]]

**Special Containment Procedures:** Undefined.[[footnote]] Note: Forward this to HCML rep. [[/footnote]]

**Description:** SCP-6427 is the temporary designation given to an entity currently inside Site-324. The full extent of its abilities is currently unknown, but it is believed that SCP-6427 is capable of teleportation, abnormal feats of strength, and enhanced agility.[[footnote]] discerning additional abilities has presented several challenges, due to the ongoing situation. [[/footnote]]

SCP-6427 appears to be a pale grey creature approximately 3 meters tall. [[footnote]] Taking exact measurements is currently unfeasible. [[/footnote]]

SCP-6427 possesses irregular body proportions, with some appendages extending over 2 meters further than others. [[footnote]] I'll be cleaning up the description when the entity isn't breathing down my neck. I hope. [[/footnote]]

SCP-6427 possesses mild antimemetic properties, which it theoretically uses in order to avoid description.[[footnote]] As if anyone could describe a single creature for long, especially at this hour.  Also: Double-check the meaning of antimemetic later. [[/footnote]]

SCP-6427 was discovered after sightings of a hostile force inside Site-324 were confirmed on 12/10/2021. The entity proceeded to engage several members of Site Security, ultimately overpowering them and turning towards nearby personnel.[[footnote]] This is probably off tone, hopefully, I'll be able to fix it later. [[/footnote]]

The entity materialized inside Junior Researcher Michaels' living quarters at approximately 3:56 AM[[footnote]] Bastard. **REMOVE THIS LATER** [[/footnote]] and was subsequently restrained accidentally by a file describing it[[footnote]] A miracle, if you take into account the battery left on my laptop. [[/footnote]], which Michaels had made in an attempt to communicate with any available member of site staff.[[footnote]] I will never thank orientation enough after this. We all laughed at "If you see an entity lunging at you, use your last breath to document it", but I guess it's not always about being part of an undercover meat grinder with these people. [[/footnote]]

SCP-6427 is thought to possess an aversion to written descriptions of it, which render it inert.[[footnote]] Verbal descriptions and video logs seem to have no effect since the entity did not stop until I wrote its designation. [[/footnote]]

When SCP-6427 is actively described in a document, it assumes a fetal position, although a pause longer than a second restores its ability to move.[[footnote]] Note: I was willing to risk it for science. It's practically on top of me now. [[/footnote]]

[[div id="blink-bar"]] 
Although SCP-6427 could remain contained indefinitely[[footnote]] Provided I find my power cord. [[/footnote]] by describing it, this method of containment is unfeasible, in part due to th 
[[/div]]
